name: Inactive Item
query:
select 
`tabItem`.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:50",
`tabItem`.item_name as "name::150",
`tabItem`.item_group as "group::150",
`tabItem`.brand as "brand::100",
ifnull((select sum(actual_qty) from `tabBin` left join `tabWarehouse` on `tabWarehouse`.name = `tabBin`.warehouse where `tabWarehouse`.summery_stock = 1 and `tabBin`.item_code = `tabItem`.item_code  ),0) as "Balance:Float:100"
from 
`tabItem`
where
`tabItem`.item_code not in ( select `tabStock Ledger Entry`.item_code from `tabStock Ledger Entry` where `tabStock Ledger Entry`.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s 
and `tabStock Ledger Entry`.voucher_type = "Delivery Note"
and `tabItem`.name = `tabStock Ledger Entry`.item_code)
and (select sum(actual_qty) from `tabBin` left join `tabWarehouse` on `tabWarehouse`.name = `tabBin`.warehouse where `tabWarehouse`.summery_stock = 1 and `tabBin`.item_code = `tabItem`.item_code) > 0
